title: (x) yoplait logo / no image - ITC Avant Garde Gothic {Mark S}
content: Im trying to figure out the typeface for yoplait yogurt, can anyone help me?
author: hgtiede@live.com

comments.content: [Avant Garde](http://web.archive.org/web/20100331041052/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/itc-avant-garde-gothic/), possibly customized, depending on the specific instance.
Thank you ill look at that.
